serviceArea: 30-mile radius from Pacheco, CA including Martinez, Concord, Walnut Creek, Pleasant Hill, Lafayette, Benicia, and surrounding Contra Costa County communities
shortDescription: Expert handyman and renovation services for residential and commercial properties. From quick repairs to full kitchen and bathroom remodels. Quality craftsmanship and creative solutions.
longDescription: Rich's Rainbow Renovations is your go-to handyman and renovation company for both residential and commercial projects in the Contra Costa County area. Whether you need a quick repair, a full kitchen or bathroom remodel, or specialized refinishing services, our skilled team is here to help. We take pride in delivering top-quality craftsmanship, reliable service, and creative solutions tailored to your needs. Our comprehensive services include home renovations, kitchen and bathroom remodeling, art and antique restoration, plumbing and electrical work, carpentry, debris hauling, garage organization, and concrete and paver work. We offer versatile expertise with attention to detail and a customer-focused approach. Your satisfaction is our priorityâ€”we listen, plan, and deliver exactly what you need. Let us transform your space with care and expertise!
